sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const CourseDetail = ({ course }) => { return (

{course.name}

Overview

{course.description}

Key Topics

    {course.topics.map((topic, index) => (
  • {topic}
    • ))}

Course Resources

Main Course Link:

Access Course

Tutorial Videos:

    {course.resources.youtubeLinks.map((link, index) => (
  • Tutorial Video {index + 1}
    • ))}

Additional Materials:

    {course.resources.materials.map((material, index) => (
  • {material}
    • ))}
); }; export default CourseDetail;
